Hi! I'm a graduate student at Carnegie Mellon University in the Entertainment Technology Center where I am working on rapidly prototyping entertainment experiences in the Building Virtual Worlds class. I enjoy making art, especially visual, and using technology to achieve it.

RESUME

Selected Projects

Twisty Tree

A 2D puzzle platformer set in a 3D world, like Fez. Made in Unity at Gamecraft, a 24 hour game jam, in a team of 2

8th Sea

A marine exploration game made for a game development module in NUS. See the full description and download the game to play from the Itch.io page here.

ZBrush Concept Sculpt

In March 2018 I did a concept/beauty sculpt of a D&D Tiefling character in ZBrush.

Dragon (Unity Art Pipeline)

Modeled, textured, rigged and animated a dragon model. Then brought it into Unity and scripted a simple circular catwalk scene.

Love Handles

Naive guest round. Meta 2 puzzle game

OCTOBER BABIES

Halloween themed endless runner on the Kinect

Woo Who?

Story game.

Frog Character - full pipeline

Created a character for a story game about serenading a Princess. Sculpted in ZBrush, retopologized, rigged, and animated in Maya.

Blendshape Animation

Used Blendshapes to create an animation for the sodagun hands in Space Bar, an asymmetrical VR bartending experience.

Modelling and Animating with scripts

Used Python scripts to model, rig, and animate assets for Space Bar, a VR bartending experience.

Soda gun stream effect and UV panner

To accomplish the effect of a soda gun, I wrote a shader to animate the texture on liquid flow with UV panning. It was also used as a projection on the bar walls.

Isetta Engine Project Cover

Concepted and executed a book cover illustration for the Isetta Engine Project, which was publishing a book compiling interviews with game engine programmers to document the game engine development process.

SPACEBAR

An asymmetrical VR coop bartending experience.
